=====
LibKG
=====


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/libkg.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/libkg

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/FudanSELab/libkg.svg

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/libkg/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://libkg.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?version=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Python Boilerplate contains all the boilerplate you need to create a Python package.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://libkg.readthedocs.io.
